0:
for i in $(seq 1 180); do
  test -f /host/etc/cni/net.d/10-calico.conflist && exit 0
  sleep 1
done
exit 1
The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }} is expiring

The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }}
on resolver {{ "{{ $labels.resolver }}" }} is invalid

while true ; do
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetching metrics ..."
  curl -s 'http://snmp-exporter-sr505n:9116/snmp?module=sr505n_dsl&target=192.168.1.1' | sponge /config/sr505n.prom
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetch complete."
  sleep 300
done

# Enable AOF https://redis.io/topics/persistence#append-only-file
appendonly yes
# Disable RDB persistence, AOF persistence already enabled.
save ""
maxmemory 94371840
maxmemory-policy allkeys-lru

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
